definition: (dialect) to be full of zeal/high-spirited/exhilarating/to stir sb up
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Engaged in conversation, they did not see me.
sentences.chinese: 他們談得正來勁，沒看見我。

sentences.english: The boxers were goaded on by the shrieking crowd.
sentences.chinese: 拳擊運動員聽見觀衆的喊叫就來勁兒了。

sentences.english: Their eyes brighten as they always do when such news comes.
sentences.chinese: 他們眼睛發亮，一有這樣的消息他們就來勁。

sentences.english: I did well and enjoyed the walking.
sentences.chinese: 我幹得不錯，走的還挺來勁。
